name.baseName: 育肥猪生产 ; 化肥生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In 2010, the yield of corn, soybean and wheat per hectare in Liaoning Province was 5 497 kg, 2 763 kg and 4 933 kg respectively. The coefficient of conversion from soybean cake to soybean was 1.19, and the coefficient of conversion from wheat bran to wheat was 6.67. Nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizer (converted) are 153.9, 11.9 and 2.7 kg applied per hectare for corn production, and nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizer (converted) are 24.5, 2.9 and 1.2 kg applied per hectare for soybean production. The nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizers (converted) applied per hectare of wheat were 136.2, 19.1 and 2.3 kg, respectively.

辽宁省 2010 年玉米、大豆和小麦每公顷产量分 别为 5 497、2 763、4 933 kg。大豆饼折算成大豆的系 数为 1.19，麦麸折算成小麦的系数为 6.67。生产每 公顷玉米需施用氮（N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O）肥（折纯） 分别为 153.9、11.9、2.7 kg，生产每公顷大豆需施用氮 （N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O）肥（折纯）分别为 24.5、2.9、1.2 kg，生产每公顷小麦需施用氮（N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O） 肥（折纯）分别为 136.2、19.1、2.3 kg。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The evaluation unit was 1000 fattening pigs

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The content of evaluation includes: direct gas emission and indirect pollutant emission from power consumption in the process of fertilizer production
评价内容包括：化肥生产过程中直接气体排放和耗电所产生的间接污染物排放
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set is intended for use in environmental impact assessments of agricultural and animal husbandry industries, specifically focusing on the fertilizer application in corn, soybean, and wheat production, and its relationship with the fattening pig production cycle in Liaoning Province. It can be utilized to evaluate the direct and indirect emissions, including greenhouse gases, that are produced in the production of fertilizer and in the maintenance of large-scale chemical fattening pig farms.
本数据集主要用于农业和畜牧业环境影响评估，特别关注在辽宁省玉米、大豆和小麦生产中的化肥应用，以及其与育肥猪生产周期的关系。可以用于评估化肥生产和大型化学育肥猪场维护过程中产生的直接和间接排放，包括温室气体。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: In this study, LCA method was applied to evaluate the environmental impact of fattening pig production on large-scale chemical fattening pig farms in Liaoning Province
本研究以辽宁省规模化育肥猪养殖场为对象，应 用 LCA 方法对育肥猪生产的环境影响进行评估

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this paper were collected from 36 large-scale chemical fattening pig farms in Liaoning province. The potential impacts of global warming, environmental acidification and eutrophication in the process of fattening pig production were calculated with reference to the relevant data provided by Liaoning Statistical Yearbook.
本文数据来自辽宁省36家规模化育肥猪养殖场调查；并参照《辽宁统计年鉴》提供的相关数据计算出育 肥猪生产过程中全球变暖、环境酸化和富营养化的影 响潜力。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizer (converted) are 153.9, 11.9 and 2.7 kg applied per hectare for corn production, and nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizer (converted) are 24.5, 2.9 and 1.2 kg applied per hectare for soybean production. The nitrogen (N), phosphorus (P2O5) and potassium (K2O) fertilizers (converted) applied per hectare of wheat were 136.2, 19.1 and 2.3 kg, respectively
生产每 公顷玉米需施用氮（N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O）肥（折纯） 分别为 153.9、11.9、2.7 kg，生产每公顷大豆需施用氮 （N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O）肥（折纯）分别为 24.5、2.9、1.2 kg，生产每公顷小麦需施用氮（N）、磷（P2O5）、钾（K2O） 肥（折纯）分别为 136.2、19.1、2.3 kg

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 刘鸣达, 赵妍, 刘显军, & 王耀晶. 辽宁省育肥猪生产环境影响的生命周期评价. 农业环境科学学报 31, 1250–1255 (2012).
刘鸣达, 赵妍, 刘显军, & 王耀晶. 辽宁省育肥猪生产环境影响的生命周期评价. 农业环境科学学报 31, 1250–1255 (2012).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should carefully apply the presented data within the context of a Life Cycle Assessment for the designated regions and agricultural products. Special attention should be given to the allocation of emissions to the specific crop outputs (corn, soybean, wheat) and to the animal husbandry sector (fattening pigs). Methodologies for converting soybean cake to soybeans and wheat bran to wheat based on the given coefficients should be accurately adhered to, and the impact calculations should reflect regional specificity as per the Liaoning Statistical Yearbook. Direct emissions from fertilizer production and indirect emissions associated with power consumption should be accounted for when assessing the environmental footprint.
用户在指定地区和农产品的生命周期评估中应仔细应用提供的数据。特别要注意将排放量分配到具体作物产出（玉米、大豆、小麦）及畜牧部门（育肥猪）。应严格遵守基于给定系数将大豆饼转换为大豆和麦麸转换为小麦的方法，并且影响计算应反映《辽宁统计年鉴》中的区域特性。在评估环境足迹时，应考虑化肥生产的直接排放和与电力消耗相关的间接排放。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 作为参考定量，非实际输出
